channel.title: Somebody help me please
channel.description: :confused: :confused: somebody plz help, heres the problem.. when i dl a server and client and i open the cleint (and source). and i try 2 log on with there client it ays connecting 2 server example: garboscape.no-ip.biz on port 43594. it just does that then says error connecting 2 server. i no what the problem is. its that its not my no-ip. so how do i get it 2 save as my no-ip??? pleae someone help :confused: :confused:

item.title: Somebody help me please
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Coder Epic_Coder
item.description:
@Epic_Coder wrote:

chicken liver:

somebody plz help, heres the problem… when i dl a server and client and i open the cleint (and source). and i try 2 log on with there client it ays connecting 2 server example: garboscape.no-ip.biz on port 43594. it just does that then says error connecting 2 server. i no what the problem is. its that its not my no-ip. so how do i get it 2 save as my no-ip??? pleae someone help

Right you either havn’t set it up propperly.

Checklist:
PortForwarding in the router [] Research this further.
Running the server []
Setting up no-ip []

Good luck
Use the search bar

Read full topic

item.title: Somebody help me please
item.dc:creator: @kid2kewl2 kid2kewl2
item.description:
@kid2kewl2 wrote:

If your topic title is “Somebody help me please” or something along that line you’re not going to get help from the people who actually can help you, no-one knows what exactly or even have a general idea of what you need help with.

Try saying in the subject what it is you need help with. It will get your help a lot faster.

Read full topic

item.title: Somebody help me please
item.dc:creator: @maxmurks maxmurks
item.description:
@maxmurks wrote:

Well it looks like you haven’t port forwarded correctly, so you can either just go with Hamachi or just use a blank IP if you want to just play on your server by your self and edit it.

Read full topic
